subject: RE: [junit] JUnit Architecture
msgSnippet: ... This is the Composite pattern. Cheers, Ilja
messageBody:
thecyriuz82 wrote:
> Hello everybody,
>
> I have a little question because I have to write an article about
> JUnit for my studies.
>
> Now, I found out that the classes "TestCase" and "TestSuite"
> implements the interface "Test". My problem is, that I don't
> really know what this means exactly. I'm very new with JUnit.
>
> So I would be very happy, if anybody can give me a short
> answer to my question. Thanks a lot to all of you.

This is the Composite pattern.

Cheers, Ilja
